alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:36PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dawes County through 515 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Slim Butte to near Chadron Airport. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chadron around 500 PM MDT. Chadron Campground and Red Cloud Campground around 515 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
